Resource PlanDefinition "IMMZ.DT.11.JapaneseEncephalitis"

url: http://fhir.org/guides/who/smart-immunization/PlanDefinition/IMMZ.DT.11.JapaneseEncephalitis

version: 0.1.0

name: IMMZ.DT.11.JapaneseEncephalitis

title: IMMZ.DT.11.JapaneseEncephalitis

status: draft

date: 2023-03-31 14:40:29+0000

publisher: World Health Organization (WHO)

description: If child or person has not been vaccinated, give Japanese Encephalitis vaccine according to the defined schedule

jurisdiction: Global (Whole world) (m49.htm#001)

library: IMMZDT11

action

title: Immunize Patient for Japanese Encephalitis - No Doses

description: Provide Japanese Encephalitis immunizations – using the "Japanese Encephalitis vaccine immunization – NO PREVIOUS" schedule (2 dose scheme)

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Japanese Encephalitis vaccine immunization history" = "No-doses"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Japanese Encephalitis because no doses in a 2 dose scheme

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Current Patient Age in Months" >= 6text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Japanese Encephalitis because no doses in a 2 dose scheme

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Country is administering Inactivated Vero cell-derived antigen" = TRUEtext/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Japanese Encephalitis because no doses in a 2 dose scheme

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Country recognizes JE as a health priority" = TRUEtext/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Japanese Encephalitis because no doses in a 2 dose scheme

definition: IMMZ.DT.11.JE.01

action

title: Immunize Patient for Japanese Encephalitis - 2nd dose

description: Provide Japanese Encephalitis immunizations – using the "Japanese Encephalitis vaccine immunization – Inactivated Vero cell-derived" schedule (2 dose scheme)

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Japanese Encephalitis vaccine immunization history" = "1 dose"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Japanese Encephalitis because 1 dose in a 2 dose scheme

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Date last JE dose given" >= "4 weeks"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Japanese Encephalitis because 1 dose in a 2 dose scheme

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Type of last JE dose" = "Inactivated Vero cell-derived"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Japanese Encephalitis because 1 dose in a 2 dose scheme

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Country recognizes JE as a health priority" = TRUEtext/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Japanese Encephalitis because 1 dose in a 2 dose scheme
